name: clutch-cli
description: AI-powered file description generator for GitHub repositories

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.pkg: npm run build:all && pkg dist/ncc/index.js --compress Brotli
scripts.pkg:all: npm run build:all && pkg dist/ncc/index.js --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-linux-x64,node18-linux-arm64 --compress Brotli --output clutch

author: Michael Sayman
